title: Limiting majority rule to create more democracy

content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Identify the part of the national government that was originally most closely tied to citizens and explain how it was tied to citizens. (b) Explain two ways the United States Constitution limited majority rule. (c) Choose two of the following twentieth-century developments and explain how each moved the United States from a less democratic system to a more democratic system. Primary elections The Seventeenth Amendment Expansion of suffrage
